Global Settings

General#

  1. Image border - adds a border to the following images (to products in collections, wishlist, cart, and to blog posts)
  2. Enable quick view - quick view toggle
  3. Enable wishlist - wishlist toggle

Colors#

  1. Base

    1. Primary - #007bff by default
    2. Secondary - #6c757d by default
    3. Dark - #343a40 by default
    4. Light - #f8f9fa by default
    5. Body - #ffffff by default

  2. Utilities

    1. Product price - #28a745 by default
    2. Badge / Sold out - #d32f2f by default
    3. Badge / Discount - #388e3c by default

Typography#

  1. Fonts

    1. Headings font family - Poppins Regular by default
    2. Body font family - Poppins Regular by default

Social media#

  1. Social sharing image (not working yet)

  2. Social sharing buttons

    1. Share on Facebook - toggle
    2. Tweet on Twitter - toggle
    3. Pin on Pinterest - toggle
    4. Share on WhatsApp - toggle
    5. Send via Email - toggle

  3. Social media links

    1. Facebook link - sharing link
    2. Twitter link - sharing link
    3. Instagram link - sharing link
    4. Pinterest link - sharing link
    5. Snapchat link - sharing link
    6. YouTube link - sharing link
    7. LinkedIn link - sharing link

Favicon#

Â Â Â Will be scaled down to 32x32

Toast#

Â Â Â Toast is used to display various important global messages usually via ajax. (E.g: When adding products to cart)

  1. Position - Bottom left, bottom center, bottom right
  2. Autohide - 10 - 60 sec, 15 sec by default

Checkout#

  1. Banner

  2. Logo

    1. Custom image - sets logo instead of â€œConvermax2â€ title
    2. Position - left, center, right
    3. Logo size - small, medium, large

  3. Main content area

    1. Background image - sets background to main section
    2. Background color - sets background color instead of image
    3. Form fields - sets form color (white, transparent)

  4. Order summary

    1. Background image - sets background to order summage section
    2. Background color - sets background color instead of image

  5. Typography

    1. Headings - Sans-Serif, Serif (System by default)
    2. Body - Sans-Serif, Serif (System by default)

  6. Colors

    1. Accent - Links, highlights and checkmarks
    2. Buttons - Gift card/discount and next step buttons
    3. Errors - Messages and invalid fields

  7. Checkout settings
